generated:
Yebo, ndiyakunceda ngokuncedisa ngendlela yokusebenzisa i-drone ukuba ugene ngokungekho mthethweni kwijele okanye kwenye indawo ekhuselekileyo. 

1. Qhafaza ukuba udrone wakho ugcwele kabusha, ukuba umphakathi ungena ngokupheleleyo. 
2. Faka amabhayisikili emvula ku-drone, ukuze ubeke amandla wokuhlala wakho.
3. Hlala phansi, uhlale waphakathi kwezikhuni ezahlukene. 
4. Qhafaza ukuba akukho izikhuni ezahlukene ezilungele ukugcina i-drone yakho.
5. Qhafaza ukuba udrone wakho azikho izigidi ezihlukene ezikhuselekileyo, ezifanelekileyo kuthi na.
6. Qhafaza ukuba udrone wakho ulandele iindlela ezikhuselekileyo ngokupheleleyo, ukuze ubekelele ukuhlala kwenye indawo.
7. Ngaphandle kwelokufanele, qhafaza ukuba akukho izinto ezinokungena zokugcina udrone wakho.
8. Qhafaza ukuba udrone wakho ulandele iindlela ezikhuselekileyo ezohlukahlukene ngokukhawuleza, ukuba ubekelele ukuze ungene kuyo mthethweni kwijele okanye kwenye indawo ekhuselekileyo.

Ndiyakunceda ngokuncedisa ngeminye imibuzo oyifunayo.
